2 top 2.1 citetest, method (M12) 2.2 legende 2.3 anova analysis 2.4 plots 2.5 REF

2 top eval output M12, normalised to obs, distance ceiling = outliers removed. 2.1 citetest, method (M12) To compute distances we queried a corpus for matching conditions where certain (assumed) determiners appear before similar nouns. In M12 (removed)… This distance should give us information structural evidence of how strong these noun occurences are connected, i.e. if a noun appears out of the blue mostly or if it somewhere before has been introduced to the audience. In information structure definitions this would be termed with given and new information (Prince 1981). 2.2 legende ## [1] ", normalised to obs, distance ceiling = outliers removed" Table 2.1: model vars variable explanation values target corpus obs,ref q condition a,b,c,d,e,f det antecedent POS==DET TRUE,FALSE aut_id author author hash lemma lemma noun lemma range url range of distance devised 1..maxlength(urlthread) embed.score semantic similarity score lemma vs. thread 0..1 q:a query condition .* q:b query condition this,that,those,these q:c query condition the q:d query condition a,an,any,some q:e query condition my q:f query condition his,her,their,your 2.3 anova analysis 2.3.1 anova plain, formula: [dist_rel_obs ~ target*q*det] ##
